name: Tesco Finest 6 Pork And Herb Sausages 454G
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Oven><Temperature F="375°F" G="Gas 5" C="190°C" /><Time>25 - 30 mins</Time><Instructions>Remove all packaging.For best results do not prick sausage skins.Place on a lightly greased baking tray in the centre of a pre-heated oven for 25-30 minutes.</Instructions></Oven><Microwave><Item23 LineNumber="1" Step="" T650="" T750="" T850="" /></Microwave><Barbeque /><Grill><Time>16 - 17 mins</Time><Temperature_Setting>Medium</Temperature_Setting><Instructions>Remove all packaging.For best results do not prick sausage skins.Place under a pre-heated grill for 16 - 17 minutes.Turn occasionally.</Instructions></Grill><Shallow_Fry><Time>10 - 12 mins</Time><Instructions>Remove all packaging.For best results do not prick sausage skins.Fry in a little oil over a medium heat for 10-12 minutes, turning occasionally. Drain well before serving.</Instructions></Shallow_Fry><Deep_Fry /><Stir_Fry /><Steam /><Poach /><Hob /><Boil_In_The_Bag /><Oven_From_Frozen><Temperature F="" G="" C="" /></Oven_From_Frozen><Microwave_From_Frozen><Item24 LineNumber="1" Step="" T650="" T750="" T850="" /></Microwave_From_Frozen><Cooking_Precautions>All appliances vary these are guidelines only.Tesco recommend that all meat products are cooked thoroughlyNot suitable for microwave cooking.Not suitable for cooking from frozen. </Cooking_Precautions></Cooking_Instructions><Freezing_Instructions><Freezing_Guidelines>Freeze on day of purchase. Use within one month. </Freezing_Guidelines><Defrosting>Defrost thoroughly for a minimum of 12 hours in a refrigerator.IMPORTANT: If food has thawed, do not refreeze.</Defrosting></Freezing_Instructions>
PromotionDescription: 50 extra points on any fresh pre-packed sausages
